website_summaries.verdict: A well-rounded, well made kit at a quality price point.
pros: Kit includes foil "Oh Baby" balloons, burlap "Welcome Baby" banner, and an assortment of paper lanterns, pom-poms, and garland
Burlap banner can be reused many times
No need for helium – foil balloons come with straw inflation tool
Quality decorations sit at a value price point
cons: Foil balloons look like the wrong letters until you inflate them

customer_reviews.title: Decorations are Oh-So-Cute!
customer_reviews.text: We couldn't wait for the baby shower to try out these decorations. The banner is adorable and super easy to hang. The little gold discs add extra sparkle. And I know my teenager is going to want to hang the gold and white lanterns in her room after her cousin's shower. Everything was easy to assemble and hang. I can hardly wait to see the look on my niece's face when she sees these decorations! I definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great decorations to use for baby shower
customer_reviews.text: I used this decorations set for baby shower, but it can be used for any event like birthday party; or you can simply decor your baby's room. It brings a festive atmosphere to your house. The good thing is that the decorations can be reused because of the neutral colors (yellow, golden, white). These colors are applicable to boys and girls, what is very convenient. Balloons are easy to inflate; pom pom flowers are GORGEOUS! No damages or marks. I definitely RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: Morosan Ecaterina

customer_reviews.title: Lots of decorations for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set! The shower isn't for a few more weeks but was excited to open it and see how it would work for the space. Super surprised by all the stuff. Seems like such a small bag but so much comes out of it (not all of it is pictured.) I was slightly intimidated by the paper flower but was pleasantly surprised by how it turned out and glad I got to practice on one. So so excited to use these at the shower!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy setup directions
customer_reviews.text: The product came with everything needed and clear directions. I was worried that the balloons and lanterns would be difficult to set up but everything was either explained or self-explanatory. Also, keep the string on the pom poms, shown in the gold photo. I removed it on accident so retying it made the flower puff look a little disfigured. Otherwise, I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't bad for the money. The flower things were a bit hard to put together. They tear so easy. The instructions say to be gentle, which I was, but they still tore easy. The balloons were super hard to put together. I busted two of them and we were being super careful with the helium machine. But we made it work. It turned about being super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper Colwell

customer_reviews.title: Great product!! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: The product is exactly as described. I loved the oh baby balloons! They came with a straw and blew up easily after a few puffs of air. Those reviews that say they received different letters must not have inflated them or did not look at the product photos. The letter B look a little like a G or U until it is blown up with air. I had bought another set of balloons from another seller as back up but I returned them; the ones included in this set are thicker and better quality. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Carol E Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Easy Going Does It
customer_reviews.text: Loved this set w a couple of exceptions. The “Oh Baby” foil balloons were cute but 2 letters came w holes in the balloons. We put them up anyway BC we’re relaxed but you might not be. The delicate tissue Pom-poms were adorable but not as easy to form as they make them out to be. It turned out fine and my daughter just enjoyed attempting these things together. The paper lanterns were a BIG hit as were the banners w burlap “Welcome Baby.” For the price it was a huge success.
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: Alot for your money
customer_reviews.text: I thought this pack worked out pretty well for the baby shower. The burlap Welcome Baby sign was very well made and super cute. The lanterns were nice and easy to set up. The pom poms were a little strange in setting them up but it turned out nice. We ended up cutting the circular strings into 5 pieces and hung them on the fan. I was least impressed with the OH BABY balloons. Only two of the letters stayed inflated, the others deflated. Overall, I would probably buy this set again but the OH BABY balloons could use some tweeking.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Ulmer

customer_reviews.title: Everything I needed in one package
customer_reviews.text: I got these baby shower decorations for a friends baby shower at work. Everything I needed in one package with clear directions, easy to set up, break down and looked great. I am going to reuse the Pom poms and the lanterns for another friends wedding shower.
customer_reviews.author: EmLVT

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and great value
customer_reviews.text: These were a total hit at the baby shower I threw for my friend! Very beautiful and gold virtually goes with anything. Easy to assemble, took about 30minutes so plan ahead. We used the balloons for props/background while taking pictures. Really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The poofy balls came unassembled and I couldn’t figure out how to put them together so they ended up looking strange. The lanterns were pretty cute and worked out well. The “Oh Baby” sign had a small hole in one of the letters. The set is really cute but I was disappointed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kandischey

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and easy party decorations
customer_reviews.text: These decorations are great for a baby shower, birthday party, or any type of celebration! The gold and white theme makes it perfect for celebrating a boy, a girl, or a surprise. It came with clear directions, making the pom poms and lanterns quick and easy to put together. The lanterns and pom poms look like they’re reusable if you’re careful with the paper, so consider this a multi-use product.
customer_reviews.author: Ana W

customer_reviews.title: Pass!!
customer_reviews.text: The balloons are so cheap they puncture and don't seal. I ended up throwing them away since I wasn't successful with inflating them without incident.....
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!!
customer_reviews.text: These decorations turned out to be super cute!! My daughter loved them! We had some issues with the balloons (lost a star), but the company was quick in responding and fixing the problem (gained a star). In the end, we didn't end up using them anyway since the other decorations were plenty for what we needed. Assembly wasn't complicated at all. Great choice!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great decorations
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use! Got everything set up in one hour. Balloons were easy to blow up with the straw and stayed up for days. Nice to not need helium esp with how expensive helium is nowadays.
customer_reviews.author: Linda McDougal

customer_reviews.title: Missing PomPoms
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews and saw how people had missing pieces, but I figured that the problem would have been fixed since it was still being sold. No... still missing pieces. I was disappointed. I didn't have time to get new decorations so I used them. It's a cute set, just wish all the pieces were there.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Franke

customer_reviews.title: Cute, But Missing Pieces
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this set when I saw it, especially since my daughter did not know if she were having a girl or a boy. The price was great. Unfortunately, the largest white paper balloon was missing. I have not blown up the “oh baby” balloons yet, so hopefully all of the pieces are there.
customer_reviews.author: S. Willis

customer_reviews.title: Difficult instructions but okay overall
customer_reviews.text: You need a special tool to inflate the balloons else it will take a long time to do it. The instructions to make those flowers were not the greatest. It took us some time figuring it out.
customer_reviews.author: Rashmi

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Charming
customer_reviews.text: The variety of decorations, plus the quality, make this party kit a great value. I love the sparkly gold glitter garland. It pulls all of the other decorations together. The instructions for the pom poms are easy to follow and when they're fully opened, they're charming. The burlap and gold create a rustic elegance that will look great in my contemporary living room.
customer_reviews.author: PMcB

customer_reviews.title: This was nice.
customer_reviews.text: Everything was fine with hanging up except the air kept coming out of the O in "Oh" although I tied it and the paper balls were hard to figure out. It still turned out nice.
customer_reviews.author: acovi006

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but took a lot of time to put together
customer_reviews.text: Cute decor. One of the balloons wouldnt inflate. Thought balloons would be bigger. The poms that came with the kit were kind of a pain to put together but once everything was assembled it was really cute!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Garrie

customer_reviews.title: Cute gender neutral set
customer_reviews.text: There's a lot of bang for your buck with this set. Unfortunately the shower venue had really high ceilings and I couldn't use it as pictured. But I did use most of the pieces in other ways. The lanterns & flowers were easy to assemble & there was plenty of ribbon to use for the Welcome Baby sign.
customer_reviews.author: Alice P

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this setup for a work baby shower. This was so cute and just as described. Great value for the price as well. Everyone kept commenting how cute it was. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Travel Mom

customer_reviews.title: Balloons had holes
customer_reviews.text: I planned to use the "Oh Baby" on the main prop at my sister's shower. Unfortunately, I had to run around and find something different to use the day of because two of the balloons had holes in them. Everything else was fine and as pictured. I was pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan G.

customer_reviews.title: The balloons have poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: The balloons were difficult to inflate even with the straw. The first 3 balloons I tried inflating all ripped so I just tossed them all in the trash. The quality of everything else was okay and had no problems assembling them.
customer_reviews.author: Banana

customer_reviews.title: Quality and quantity for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for your buck. It had a lot in this set. Everything looked super cute together. The poms were hard to shape, they took awhile to do all of them. Balloons looked better tapped on to wall than hung up with the string provided. The burlap letting was a nice touch. This set was perfect for the gender neutral baby shower I hosted. I would purchase again if I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for all in one decor
customer_reviews.text: This set was perfect for our baby shower. Everything came as described and it was easy to setup. Aside from the banners, we love that we’ll be able to reuse the lanterns and pompoms for future parties.
customer_reviews.author: Jhoanna

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These baby shower decorations are classic and cute! I love the gender neutral aspect as well as the variety of decorations that come in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Hole in balloon
customer_reviews.text: One of the balloons had a hole in it which pretty much defeats the purpose of having the balloons.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received and excited to set it up!
customer_reviews.text: Received this today and so excited! I can't wait to bring it to my friends baby shower next Saturday. It came packaged very well, and it will look great at the shower. I chose the neutral one, and some of this can be used at another time as well in addition to the shower. I'll post a followup photo :) Mahalo from Hilo Hawaii!
customer_reviews.author: KathleenAloha

customer_reviews.title: Wrong letters
customer_reviews.text: Overall cute and simple decorations but I was disappointed to find that for the balloon letters we were missing one of the B’s and instead got two A’s. Didn’t have time to return it since this was last minute for a coworkers shower.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Chwistek

customer_reviews.title: It was a good set, except the balloons....
customer_reviews.text: The oh baby balloons did not workout. They were pretty silly looking. The rest was great!
customer_reviews.author: melissacg

customer_reviews.title: Loved it all!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a baby shower. More than enough decorations came in this item, loved the Pom pons ,banner and gold decor. Perfect for a burlap party.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cute decorations
customer_reviews.text: These were the cutest decorations. We did not use the balloons so I can't say how easy they were to inflate. Everything else was adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute set, worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I was super impressed with both the quality of the set and how much we received for the price. Everything matched beautifully and looked perfect for my best friend's shower. She did a spring garden baby shower and everything in the set went perfectly with the theme. We especially liked the welcome baby sign that was on a really cute burlap type of material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby Shower
customer_reviews.text: Love the natural colors great for boys or girls Baby Shower
customer_reviews.author: Jabs32styles

customer_reviews.title: The balloons came out great
customer_reviews.text: Half of it was too complicated to set up, little to no instructions
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great bundle!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the entire set! The balloons were a little hard to inflate, but once I understood it, they turned out great. The burlap welcome baby banner, was stronger than expected. Would definitely reside the banner & lanterns again. Don’t hesistate to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You forgot the L
customer_reviews.text: This would have been better if you put the L in WeLcome. Everything else was fine but that is what I really wanted. I would have thought it was a really good value, but the Welcome was spelled wrong.
customer_reviews.author: James Studebaker

customer_reviews.title: Great value, nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set for the price. Saved me a lot of time and energy, and we got a lot of compliments on the decorations.
customer_reviews.author: K-Hen

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This product was really good, and everything was as pictured. Overall you get a lot for your money. The only reason I’m giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is because the A balloon had a hole in it. Luckily I was able to run to target and get another “oh baby” balloon set for $5.
customer_reviews.author: veronica

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need in one
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my baby shower and everything was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Tierra

customer_reviews.title: Awful waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this minus stars. It is so cheap. The balloons are impossible to blow up, they all ripped instantly. The paper smells awful and the colors are just ugly. Didn’t end up using any of it for the baby shower. DONT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Everything turned out great except for the balloons, we could not figure out how to inflate them. No instructions or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Missing balloons!
customer_reviews.text: I was missing three balloons...I was only able to spell “boy” out.
customer_reviews.author: La

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It was a lot for the price and easy to assemble because my 10 year old helped with decorations lol.
customer_reviews.author: Blaire Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product & value for money!
customer_reviews.text: Great product & price! Was impressed with quality and value for money! Got my product quickly and everyone commented on the decor at baby shower 😊 burlap/white/gold- with everything included!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Worse buy ever. The burlap sign was all wrong don’t know how this was even sent out the welcome baby was wllcome bby how do you miss the letters? The balloons came with a straw that was flat and would not any air flow could not use either for decoration. Very cheaply made and would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amber Webb

customer_reviews.title: Wired outlook, quality isn’t good.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money, quality isn’t very well. And it comes with some big and small white balls, which is very wired when celebrating a baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: Sailing International Trading LLC

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Spelling
customer_reviews.text: It was supposed to spell "Welcome", but the instead of the W it was an M. I was very disappointed because it was for a surprise baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: Sarahmcg621

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive correct balloons
customer_reviews.text: The “Oh Baby” Balloons did not come with the correct letters...instead I got “YAHUGG”. The rest of the decorations were fine.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Van Houten

customer_reviews.title: Balloons Don’t Inflate
customer_reviews.text: The balloons didn’t work. Holes were easily poked in them and they didn’t inflate. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Doss

customer_reviews.title: Great set at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Its a very cute set. I didn't want a traditional boy baby shower. We're doing these colors to go with adventure and outdoors!
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: A very great product, I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This product is of great quality. The balloons are really great and amazingly strong. The whole thing works well and looks good overall. The design is very classy and it's very easy and straightforward to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Kayode

customer_reviews.title: Wrong letter - misspelled
customer_reviews.text: Instead of saying Welcome baby our sign said Melcome baby. Unfortunate, since I was in charge of decorations for my sisters baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Good BUT...
customer_reviews.text: Everything was good however, not impressed with a basic burlap banner... my shower is in three days.. one minor thing to stress about. Hopefully they will replace..
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This was excellent! It was gorgeous, or high quality, and basically everything you need in one package.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar E.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable
customer_reviews.text: All components were absolutely adorable! Be careful when threading the letter balloons together, the ribbon can fray. Loved the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Weingust

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Loves this decorating kit! So cute and everything I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Monsanto Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Product was messed up
customer_reviews.text: The banner was supposed to say “welcome baby” but the welcome portion had wrong letters and said “wemcame”. Everything big else was really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Happy day to be
customer_reviews.text: Got my wife gift sorted out for her big day. They look durable and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: c.j

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but worked
customer_reviews.text: Cool. The oh baby balloon was a little hard to keep air in. The other decorations was a little cheap. But it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spelling error in the ‘welcome’ banner! Someone had 1 job!!!
customer_reviews.text: The welcome banner spelt ‘welbole’. The least you’ll can do is spell the banners correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Manali shanbhag

customer_reviews.title: Part is not as promised
customer_reviews.text: The foil balloons were completely unusable. They could not be inflated and did not spell “Oh Baby”
customer_reviews.author: sherlyn seigler

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality! Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t use the inflatable “oh baby” because all of the letters didn’t stay inflated.
customer_reviews.author: ThPrtty1

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my girlfriend for her friends baby shower and she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful decorations
customer_reviews.text: The oh baby helium balloons did not inflate but it was personal error to not having the proper equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Arango

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: It was great quality. Better than we expected for a very affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: Dabadash

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love These
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a baby shower this weekend. We are already working on the decorations and let me just say how much fun we had putting these up today. I just love the Burlap Letters. Those will be used in the nursery after the shower. The lanterns, balloons, and paper Balls were very easy to set up. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Latta

product_meta.title: Sweet Baby Co. Baby Shower Decorations Neutral for Boy or Girl with Welcome Baby Banner, Oh Baby Balloon, Lanterns, Flower Pom Poms, Circle Glitter Garland | Rustic Gold and White Gender Neutral Set
product_meta.description:
Sweet Baby Company Unisex Party Kits helps you decorate your unforgettable special event!

Designed to decorate from ceiling to wall, the sturdy lanterns and double layer tissue paper means you can easily create a beautiful celebration in a room. This gorgeous white and gold decoration pack for girls or boys with the cutest "Welcome Baby" burlap banner is the best choice for you. 

Sweet Baby Co. Baby Shower Decorations - Natural Deco Package includes:

BANNER
1 13-piece Welcome Baby banner with white hearts, pre-strung 

POM POMS
1x 8" white tissue paper 
1x 10" white tissue paper 
1x 12" white tissue paper 
1x 8" bold gold tissue paper 
1x 10" bold gold tissue paper 
1x 12" bold gold tissue paper 

PAPER LANTERNS
1x 10" white paper lantern 
2x 10" bold gold paper lantern 
1x 8" white paper lantern 
1x 8" bold gold paper lantern 

FOIL BALLOONS
1 6-piece OH BABY 16" gold foil letters balloons. Comes with straw for inflating by mouth. Due to their size and density, they will NOT float with helium

PAPER GARLAND
10 feet of glitter gold garland that can be used whole as streamers or cut for hanging decor 

EASY ASSEMBLING
* white string for each pompom and lantern
* Instructions for easy un-fluffing
Poms ship pre-assembled, but not fully bloomed. Instructions are included for easy un-fluffing

All pompoms you see in the photos are made by Sweet Baby Co., exactly the same you get when you order!

Perfect for: Co Ed BabyShower, Pregnancy Announcement, Bridal Event, First Birthday Party, Welcome Home Event, Safari Zoo Nursery Decoration Centerpiece, Fall Greenery Photoshoot, Gender Guessing or Guess the Due Date Games, Vintage Centerpieces or Picture Props, Bohemian, King Lion, Sunflower or Woodsy Forest Theme Parties
feature_bullets: ALL-IN-ONE DECORATION KIT INCLUDES: WELCOME BABY burlap sign, OH BABY 16 inch mylar letter balloons, 6 pom pom flowers, 5 paper lanterns, 10 feet of pre-strung glitter gold garland

FESTIVE AND FUN: Add a chic pop of yellow gold and white to the party table or nursery. You get 30 pieces of party decor for a baby shower or boho sprinkle, gender reveal, bridal showers, maternity photos backdrop, tribal nature wedding themes, jungle green birthday, woodland animal creatures themed celebrations

NO HELIUM OR TOOLS NECESSARY: No trip to party city needed! Our bundle includes all the supplies you'll need to prep the decorations right at home. Lanterns and pom poms include white string for hanging. The OH BABY letter balloons come with a special inflation straw. Balloons are designed to be air-fill only (will not float with helium) and can be re-inflated for reuse
REUSABLE BURLAP BANNER: Made with 100% natural jute burlap, this quality banner comes on two separate strings and, like the garland, is pre-strung for your convenience

MATERIALS TESTED IN THE USA: Sweet Baby Company is a self-financed, woman owned company. All Sweet Baby Co. products are professionally designed and tested with love. Your set comes with 31 pieces, all carefully packaged. As soon as your decorations arrive, check it and tell us if anything is missing so we can replace it fast before your event. There is no risk when purchasing these PREMIUM QUALITY baby shower decorations

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars226 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
